snippet.title: Ember the Werefox - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the role of young Ember, as she confronts her fears in this dream forest;  curiously resourceful by day and mystically fierce by night.

Wishlist on Steam! -  https://store.steampowered.com/app
Join the Discord -  https://discord.gg/Bcc3v9rkuw
Take a deeper look on our website - https://LionArcGames.com
